metadata.title: CVE-2024-5629 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read in the 'bson' module of PyMongo 4.6.2 or earlierallows deserialization of malformed BSON provided by a Server to raise anexception which may contain arbitrary application memory.

criterions.comment: pymongo package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
